subject: Steve's Box Explosion on Ebay *****
author: Urkel23
full_text:
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140641726938

Selling some boxes cheap, because i have a lot here that are finished that i have been sitting on for a while.  Only 2 days left on the auction.  No bidding, just one low price.  There are 3 left on there.

You will see that they are reasonably priced for an adjustable sweep ghost box.  This circuit is a linear/random hybrid sweep that i came up with.

The box sweeps in a linear fashion, but changes speeds randomly as it does it.  The sweep knob is to set a base sweep, than the circuit takes over after that.


-Steve H.
